replies.msg:
之前上黎問過video wall 既solution, 經過一番research 同巴打既幫助，而家有以下既list:

CPU: Intel Core i7 8700 4.3G/ 4.5G Board: Asus Z370E Gaming Display Card: NVS 810*2 Ram: Kingston 16 GB DDR4 2666MHz
SSD: ADATA XP6 SX8200 Series 240GB M.2 NVMe 1.3 Power Supply: Corsair CX650
Case: Phanteks Eclipse P300 Tempered Glass (add 2 fans 1 lower in, 2 out) OS: Win 10 Pro

部腦係production用途，所以唔洗storage(hdd),主要係出15個mons, extend 一個4k*15既view. 行一個web app, 有物理同埋圖像處理既web app但唔涉及3d.

呢個list夠用嗎？同埋深水埗c. Base computer ok嗎？諗住搵佢地砌。
